Question: Guangdong Boltpower Energy Co.,Ltd CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Guangdong Boltpower Energy Co.,Ltd

Product Highlights:

- Comprehensive new energy enterprise integrating sales, R&D, and production of portable energy storage power, home energy storage power, automobile jump starter, industrial and commercial energy storage system, and military special power
- Pioneer of high-power and high-safety automotive jump starter
- Products include portable power stations, car jump starters, home energy storage systems
- Range of power outputs from 100W to 6000W
- Lithium battery generators and power banks
- CE, UL, FCC, and other international certifications
- Focus on sustainability, renewable energy, and environmental impact reduction

CES 2024 Exhibited Products:

- Boltpower BP500B Portable 6000w Home Energy Storage all-In-One Machine
- Boltpower BP500A Portable Power Station 6000W for Home energy storage
- Boltpower BP360B Portable Power Station 4200W for Home energy storage
- Boltpower BP360A 4200w Home Energy Storage all-In-One Machine
- Boltpower BP2000 2000W 1997Wh Power Bank Power Station
- Boltpower BP1002 1000W 1120Wh MPPT Portable Power Station For Outdoor Camping
